name: DataMergeTextPlaceholders
shortdesc: A collection of data merge text placeholders.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a data merge text placeholder.

parameters.name: parentStory
parameters.shortdesc: The story in which to insert the placeholder.

parameters.name: storyOffset
parameters.shortdesc: The position within the story at which to insert the placeholder, specified as an offset number or an insertion point. Can accept: InsertionPoint or Long Integer.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new DataMergeTextPlaceholder

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the DataMergeTextPlaceholder.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholders within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The DataMergeTextPlaceholder, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: DataMergeTextPlaceholder, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The DataMergeTextPlaceholder, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: DataMergeTextPlaceholder, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the DataMergeTextPlaceholder that follows the desired DataMergeTextPlaceholder.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder whose index follows the specified DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The DataMergeTextPlaceholder whose index comes before the desired DataMergeTextPlaceholder.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DataMergeTextPlaceholder.
Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
